item.title: 2020 Pandemic SIP Hiring List
item.author: Rob Fuller
item.description: One of the hard things about this pandemic is many people are either losing their jobs or having a hard time finding a new one in general. It was suggested that I make one of these during this time. So, here it is. ONLY POST IF YOU CAN REMOTE INTERVIEW AND REMOTE HIRE FOR REMOTE WORK The 2020 Unofficial Pandemic Shelter-In-Place Hiring List. To get on the list is just complete the following form: https://forms.
